root: ^“Sir, due to all the fishing, some river seagulls have been harassing the fisherman and stealing some food, how do you want to deal with them?”

c-0: ^“Sir it was a hard-fought battle as they kept swooping down from the sky to attack us but we won in the end.”
^“Sir, unfortunately, the battle ended in a failure for us and the birds stole some more food.”
c-1: ^“Sir, the seagulls followed the trail of food away but they just came right back, we have to just wait until they leave soon”
c-2: ^“Sir, the archers you trained were able to get rid of the seagulls and make the rest fly away. Good choice.”
